abstract: Jennifer Senior reviews book Pacific: Silicon Chips and Surfboards, Coral Reefs and Atom Bombs, Brutal Dictators, Fading Empires, and the Coming Collision of the World's Superpowers by Simon Winchester.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Winchester spells out how the world’s largest body of water has been a player in subjects as varied as war and pop culture.

headline.main: Review: ‘Pacific’ Is Simon Winchester’s Latest Big-Picture Book
headline.print_headline: An Ocean,  and a View of the World

snippet: Mr. Winchester spells out how the world’s largest body of water has been a player in subjects as varied as war and pop culture.
